synopsis.text:
And so begins the thrilling journey of Higashino Ji, a teenager who finds his purpose and passion in the adrenaline-pumping world of racing. Initially drawn to the sheer thrill of speeding down the roads in sleek sports cars, Ji soon discovers that racing offers him much more than just excitement. Through his experiences on the track, he forms deep bonds of friendship and learns valuable life lessons.

As Ji continues to hone his racing skills, he evolves from an aimless youth into a dependable ally and a formidable racer. His growth is not just limited to his prowess on the track, but also extends to his understanding of life and the importance of camaraderie. This captivating tale of personal growth, friendship, and unbridled passion for racing will leave you rooting for Higashino Ji as he speeds towards his destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
